docs.snippet: Joe Buck, citing fears of losing his job, has had numerous hair transplant operations. One of them caused him to lose his voice....
docs.lead_paragraph: Joe Buck, citing fears of losing his job, has had numerous hair transplant operations. One of them caused him to lose his voice.
docs.abstract: Richard Sandomir TV Sports column pleads with Fox Sports announcer Joe Buck, who recently revealed that hair plug surgery nearly cost him his voice, to give up his hair plug addiction and just shave his head bald.

headline.main: Some Advice for a Balding Announcer: Let It Go, Joe
headline.print_headline: Facing the Truth Is the First Step. Now Set Your Locks Free.
